title: Dr Pepper Cream Soda is official and coming to stores in March
text:
CLOSE

Dr Pepper will add a cream soda. (Photo: Rosanna Aguilera / San Angelo Standard-Times)

The rumors are true: Dr Pepper & Cream Soda will launch in 2020, just in time for those spring cookouts.

Food Instagrammer @candyhunting announced the new soda would be available in March 2020.

The Instagram post showed new bottles of Dr Pepper showcased at the 2019 National Association of Convenience Stores annual trade show in Atlanta on Oct. 1-4.

All mentions of the new flavor online linked back to the Instagram post. There was no word on Dr Pepper's website of the flavor, raising questions about whether the flavor was really in the works.

Dr Pepper officially confirmed the news via email Thursday morning: "News this sweet is too good to keep to ourselves. We are excited to confirm Dr Pepper & Cream Soda is REAL, and we look forward to treating our fans to this next-level flavor as it starts to hit shelves nationwide in March."
